title: Connect to Jira and enable necessary Work types and Fields on Jira project
description: You must connect your Jira account and on the project you want to connect, enable 'Task' and 'Subtask' work types for requirements and testcases creation respectively. And also enable 'Summary', 'Description' and 'Priority' fields in both the work types. By default, you will be able to connect the project, see the requirements and testcases created in this app but if you don't enable these in Jira, these requirements and testcases can't be created there.
